dublin_core.dcvalue: Four dimensional fetal echocardiography has the potential to reduce the operator dependency of two dimensional ultrasonography and increase the detection rate of congenital heart defects CHDs This review is intended to summarize recent evidence of the important role that four dimensional ultrasonography with spatio temporal image correlation STIC may play in the prenatal diagnosis of CHDs
Current opinion in obstetrics And gynecology
Contemporary clinical applications of spatio-temporal image correlation in prenatal diagnosis.
